現金流量折現模型: discounted cash flow model, cash discount model

道瓊威爾希爾全球整體市場指數: Dow Jones Wilshire global total market Index

息前稅前盈餘: earning before interest and taxes, EBIT

息稅折舊攤銷前盈餘: earnings before interest, taxes, depreciation, and amortization, EBITDA

證券發行審批制度: examination and approval system for issue of securities

指數一般化自我迴歸條件異質變異模型: exponential generalized autoregressive conditional heteroskedasticity model

指數加權移動平均模型: exponentially weighted moving averages model, EWMA model

利率風險: interest rate risk or interest rate price risk

倫敦國際金融期貨交易所: London International Financial Futures Exchange, LIFFEE

股息競價特別股: market auction preferred stock (money market preferred stock)

股票交易所會員管理制度: membership regulatory system of stock exchange

修正後內部報酬率法: modified internal rate of return, MIRR

稅後淨營運收入: net operating profit after taxes, NOPAT

紐約證券交易所綜合指數: New York stock exchange composite Index

最適資本結構: optimal capital structure, target capital structure

股價淨值評價法: P/B valuation method, price per book value valuation method, P/B

住房儲蓄公積基金: public accumulation fund for housing saving

實質票據學說: real bills doctrine, real bills theory

呆帳準備金管理規定: regulation on provisions for bad debt

證券發行推薦制: sponsor's system for issue of securities

現貨-期貨平價定理: spot-futures parity theorem or cost-of-carry relationship

創新採用者類別: adopter categories in Diffusion of Innovations

策略決策過程理性程度: degree of rationality in strategic decision making

多點經營的規模經濟: economies of scale due to multiple sites

價值鏈之創新與重組: innovation and reconfiguration of value chain

要素市場之結構與區隔: structure and segmentation of factor market
